alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 12:27PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Lauderdale County through 115 PM CDT... At 1227 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Walnut Grove, or 15 miles northwest of Florence, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Florence, Killen, Lexington, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Green Hill, Center Star, Zip City, Threet and Kingtown. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CDT for northwestern Alabama.
